sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import send from'../assets/img/Send.png' import '../assets/css/Contact.css' export const Contact = () => { function encode(data) { return Object.keys(data) .map(key => encodeURIComponent(key) + "=" + encodeURIComponent(data[key])) .join("&") } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() fetch("/", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" }, body: encode({ "form-name": event.target.getAttribute("name"), ...name }) }).then(() => navigate("/thank-you/")).catch(error => alert(error)) } return ( <>

Get in touch

Contact Me

Name

E-mail

Phone Number

Subject

) }
